definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
counterpart/other person involved/opposite side/other side/receiving party
convenient/suitable/to facilitate/to make things easy/having money to spare/(euphemism) to relieve oneself

sentences.english: Beyond the bridge in the southeast of Fangwaiguan was a Western-style octagonal pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 方外观西南桥外有一座西式八角亭。

sentences.english: At this time, party boat is a sweet promise only to find the police.
sentences.chinese: 这时，方小舟才发现许嫣然是个警察。

sentences.english: CCS will not be liable for any loss due to any error of the applicant or any other person.
sentences.chinese: 本社对因申请方或他人的过错造成的损失不负责。

sentences.english: Dr. Fang knows very well about this strategy.
sentences.chinese: 方博士很明白这条策略。

sentences.english: Usually at this time of the year, Fang should be sweating in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 通常一年中这个时候，方应该在田地里满头大汗的。

sentences.english: In compliance with your request, we have instructed the bank to open the L/C in a few days.
sentences.chinese: 应你方的要求，我们已通知银行在几日内开立信用证。

sentences.english: We enclose a catalogue for your reference.
sentences.chinese: 随函附上一份目录供你方参考。

sentences.english: Please indicate the consignor and consignee in the contract.
sentences.chinese: 请在合同中注明发货方及收货方。

sentences.english: We urged on you the importance of the time factor.
sentences.chinese: 我们曾向你方强调过时间因素的主要性。

sentences.english: The cold stone of the mysterious obelisk guards its secrets.
sentences.chinese: 神秘方尖塔上的冰冷岩石保守着它的秘密。

sentences.english: The difference between our price and your counteroffer is too wide.
sentences.chinese: 我方的价格与你方还盘之间差距太大。

sentences.english: One way to resolve this apparent contradiction is to notice who the comparisons are between.
sentences.chinese: 一条解决这个明显的分歧的途径是注意谁是比较方。

sentences.english: Interest arising on the overall cash balance attributable to individual donors will be recorded in the account.
sentences.chinese: 将在帐目中记录各捐助方现金总结余产生的利息。

sentences.english: China is not the only emerging financier playing a major role in Africa.?
sentences.chinese: 中国不仅是在非洲发挥重要作用的惟一的新兴融资方。

sentences.english: We have special interest in your light industrial products.
sentences.chinese: 我们对你方轻工产品特别感兴趣。

definition: a party (in a contract or legal case)/one side/area/region
both sides (in contract)/the two opposing sides (in a dispute)
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
counterpart/other person involved/opposite side/other side/receiving party
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc
matching/fitting in with/compatible with/to correspond/to fit/to conform to/rapport/to coordinate with/to act in concert with/to cooperate/to become man and wife/to combine parts of machine

unilateral/one-sided/home remedy/folk prescription(same as 丹方)/single-drug prescription (same as 奇方[ji1 fang1], one of the seven kinds of prescriptions of Chinese medicine 七方[qi1 fang1])/metaphorically. a good solution
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
woven mat/seat/banquet/place in a democratic assembly/classifier for banquets, conversations etc
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
